about_the_game:
I present to you Tales of Fealess (ToFo) a 2D MMORPG.
The game is based on a fantasy/medieval world, where you decide to leave your home island to help in the war against the demons that have returned to invade the continent after two millennia sealed in the Underworld.

When creating the account you can choose one of several races, all with their unique classes, the races and classes are:

Human
Physical Affinity: Rogue (DPS Single Target / High Damage Late Game, Main Stats "AGI")

Physical Affinity: Gladiator (Tank/Control)

Magical Affinity: Mysticist (Wizard/Group Control)

Elf
Physical Affinity: Ranger (Ranged DPS / High Damage Early game, Burst Late Game, base atk passes through target, Main Stats "AGI")

Physical Affinity: Protector (Tank Single Target / Full tank, with invulnerability skills, two Taunts, one in area and barrier, best for Raid Bosses)

Magical Affinity: Spiritual (Healer / Buffer, Essential for all types of roles)

Orc
Physical Affinity: Brutal (High DPS Melee / Full burst, class with the highest Strength in the game, Difficulty in PvP High)

Magic Affinity: Warlock (High DPS Single Target / Group Control, High DPS)

Tidal
Physical Affinity: Viper (High DPS Melee Single Target / Full Burst One of the best classes for PvP, Main Stats "AGI")

Magic Affinity: Shaman (High DPS Burst / Off Support / Heal MP and Debuffs Clenase, PvP Late Game)

Maluk
Physical Affinity: Feral (High DPS Melee Single Target/Full burst, no crowd control, strongest AA of all, Insane Late Game, High PvP Difficulty)

Magical Affinity: Infernal (Ultra DPS Single Target / Full Burst, Anti Fighters, Ultra Massive Damage, Medium and Late Game Insane)

Dracov
Physical Affinity: Lancer (Medium DPS AOE / Easy Gameplay, multiple AOE skills)

Physical Affinity: Draconic Paladin (Off Tank DPS / High DPS, has Taunt, focused on Attack)

Physical Affinity: Draconic Warrior (High DPS Melee / Class with high difficulty in PvP, PvE has medium difficulty)

Saralos
Physical Affinity: Gloomstriker (High DPS bow user, Direction skills, Class for taunt the mobs, at mass PvP is a good class)

Magic Affinity: Pyromancer (High DPS AoE, most skills are in areas, best class for group farming, but it is a glass cannon).

The various in-game systems ensure that players don't have to be bored, some of them are:
Life skills: Fishing, mining, harvesting, forging, cooking, alchemy and many others,
Guild, Guild Boss, and GvAll Castle Siege
Many quests, some of which are secret.
Raid bosses with difficulty, not all of them are easy.
Solo and group dungeons, all of which can be done once a day.
Crafts, item enchantment (at the moment only the weapon)
And much more, I ask for everyone's help with ideas, and as I say, criticism is welcome.
The game is in beta, that is, everything is part of a large test, and one thing or another can be modified.
Thank you in advance for everyone's attention.
Follow the discord where you can download and the game channel on YouTube, there are videos of all classes.

Join the game's Discord:


Thank you in advance for everyone's attention.

name: Tales of Fearless

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: WINDOWS 10
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i5-4440 CPU @ 3.10GHz 3.10 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel(R) HD Graphics 4600
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: WINDOWS 10
  • Processor: Core i3 - Processador gamer Intel Core i3-7100
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GT 710 or superior
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: Tales of Fearless Online is a 2D MMORPG. This old-style hardcore game has pixelated graphics that bring a nostalgic feel. With 17 unique classes and profession systems, it offers a rich and diverse gaming experience. Get ready to embark on an epic open-world adventure!
